<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t create new intervals for a register being spilled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new intervals would have to be spilled anyway so its not worth it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also they currently aren&#39;t spilled so creating them and not spilling</span></CodeLine>
